original_title: Bettie Page: The Girl in the Leopard Print Bikini
overview: Featuring the vintage films, and pictures that made her a phenomenon, BETTIE PAGE, THE GIRL IN THE LEOPARD PRINT BIKINI, focuses on the life and times of the legendary model, the times in which she lived, and the impact her career had on the subsequent fifty years.
title: Bettie Page: The Girl in the Leopard Print Bikini
